async function hook(event: IO.IncomingEvent): Promise<void> {
  /** Your code starts below */


// >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
// This hook is generated and managed by the "agi/connor" integration.
// This hook tracks your conversations to provide some useful analytics on them. See the Int_Connor_Conversations_Table
// Do not edit this file manually.

   const { success, error } = await actions['agi/connor'].addOrUpdateConversation({
    conversationId: event.conversationId,
    transcript: event.state.session.history.length
      ? event.state.session.history.map((h) => ({ sender: h.sender, preview: h.preview }))
      : [{ sender: 'user', preview: event.preview }]
  })

// End of the hook
// <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<


  /** Your code ends here */
}
